summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Elite99 7pcs UV Gel Acrylic Nail Art Tips Builder Brush Pen Design Rounded Edge Nail Art Painting Detailing Brush Set Review Date: 2017/11/09 Store: Elite99 Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {} Review Text: Just as advertised and work awesome with gel. Review Title: Love these brushes! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 30pcs 3/32 inch Carbide Rotary Burr Nail Drill Bit, Professional Acrylic Nail File Drill Bit for DIY Nail Drill Manicure Pedicure Cuticle Nail Polishing Review Date: 2017/11/09 Store: SUBAY Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6.5 x 2.4 x 0.59 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '614134733071'} Review Text: Bits arecfantastic. Review Title: Nail file bits Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: MAKARTT Detachable Nail Brushes Set UV Gel Acrylic Nail Art Design Builder DIY Flat Brush Pen Set Review Date: 2017/11/09 Store: Makartt Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '7.87 x 4.72 x 1.18 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '799443901424 700755708144'} Review Text: 3 brushes broke I. Half on me the first time I used them, had to re-glue them.
The brushes are nice looking but the wood part of the handles gets nasty if you get acetone on them and the black finish will get on you.
I bought two sets of less expensive gel brushes with plastic handles and works way better. Review Title: Gel brushex Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: ~Ships From CA, USA~ 2in1 Comb Set 6PCS Nail Drill Bits Manicure & 150 PCS Nail Drill Sanding Bands Roll 80" 120" 180" Review Date: 2017/12/20 Store: WindMax Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 3 x 3 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B00PLG931U_US', 'UPC': '602253077640'} Review Text: Wonderful set, well worth the money... Review Title: Five Stars Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Bigwinner A Set of Stainless Steel Nail Cuticle Spoon Pusher Remover Cutter Nipper Clipper Professional Manicure Tools by E-LING (Set of 3) Review Date: 2017/12/20 Store: BIGWINNER Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 0.5 x 0.4 inches; 3.04 Ounces', 'UPC': '758868136224'} Review Text: Bestctoenail trimmers ever. Review Title: Five Stars Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: ASP Form-A-Nail, 24 Reusable Forms Review Date: 2017/12/20 Store: ASP Product Description: ['Asp Forman ail is a quick and easy way to create a set of acrylic nails. 24 reusable forms. Easy to follow step by step directions.'] Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Size': '24 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'ASP', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4.3 x 4 x 3.5 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'Item model number': '12443563806', 'UPC': '012443563806', 'Manufacturer': 'STAR NAIL-ASP'} Review Text: These work well but I had to be accurate when applying to nail with gel and use the light.
After a while I got better. Review Title: After a while I got better. Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details: 1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked. 2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked. 3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects. raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:  
The user's experience highlights a strong satisfaction with several products, particularly in their functionality and performance. They appreciated the brushes, noting their effectiveness and appealing appearance. The drill bits received high praise for their fantastic quality, contributing positively to the manicure process. Other items, including a comprehensive nail drill set, were deemed well worth the investment, reinforcing the value found in these purchases. The user also enjoyed the reusable forms, mentioning improvement in their application skills over time, reflecting a learning curve that ended positively.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:  
Some negative experiences emerged alongside the positive feedback. One set of brushes was found to be of poor durability, breaking shortly after initial use, signifying a potential quality issue. Additionally, the wooden handles of certain brushes were susceptible to damage from common nail products, detracting from their overall usability. Moreover, one product had mixed reviews due to the requirement of precise application techniques, which could create challenges for less experienced users.

OVERALL SUMMARY:  
The user's purchase history reveals a blend of positive and negative experiences. On the positive side, many products were celebrated for their effectiveness, value, and overall performance, indicating a satisfactory shopping journey. However, issues of durability and usability for certain items suggest room for improvement, particularly concerning the materials used and ease of application. Overall, while the user enjoyed several successful purchases, certain products did not meet their expectations, emphasizing the need for careful consideration in future selections.
